content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":250972,"originalJapaneseLine":"クルックーいわくゾンビではなくちゃんと魂があり生きていると","translatedEnglishLine":"According to Kukkuu, they are not zombies; they properly have souls and are alive."},{"lineNumber":250973,"originalJapaneseLine":"きくは別部隊２万を率いて東側の戦線に参加しているぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"Kiku is leading a separate unit of 20,000 soldiers and participating on the eastern front line."},{"lineNumber":250974,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達が臨時首都テープに到着した","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and the others have arrived at the provisional capital, Tape."},{"lineNumber":250975,"originalJapaneseLine":"マジック千鶴子、戦局説明","translatedEnglishLine":"Magic Chizuruko explains the war situation."},{"lineNumber":250976,"originalJapaneseLine":"ガンジーは前線で単独で戦っている","translatedEnglishLine":"Gandhi is fighting alone on the front lines."},{"lineNumber":250977,"originalJapaneseLine":"臨時の司令部で千鶴子、マジックと会話","translatedEnglishLine":"At the temporary command center, a conversation with Chizuruko and Magic."},{"lineNumber":250978,"originalJapaneseLine":"アニスが戻って来たがランスを見て暴走する","translatedEnglishLine":"Anis returned but goes berserk when she sees Rance."},{"lineNumber":250979,"originalJapaneseLine":"千鶴子達が外に出てアニスを止めます","translatedEnglishLine":"Chizuruko and the others go outside to stop Anis."},{"lineNumber":250980,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦闘中のイベント・・３ラウンド目","translatedEnglishLine":"Event during battle… 3rd round."},{"lineNumber":250981,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":250982,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人に乗り移られていた時よりやばいんじゃないか","translatedEnglishLine":"Isn't this worse than when she was possessed by the demon?"},{"lineNumber":250983,"originalJapaneseLine":"あいつ、本当に人間か・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Is that girl really human...?"},{"lineNumber":250984,"originalJapaneseLine":"混乱しているだけなので、すみません、もう少し耐えていただけたら","translatedEnglishLine":"She is just confused, so sorry, please bear with her a little longer."},{"lineNumber":250985,"originalJapaneseLine":"あっ、それから","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, and also,"},{"lineNumber":250986,"originalJapaneseLine":"アニスは、燃え、凍え、感電なので異常状態に極度に興奮するので","translatedEnglishLine":"Anis gets extremely agitated by abnormal states like burning, freezing, or electrocution."},{"lineNumber":250987,"originalJapaneseLine":"出来ればすみやかに解除しながらお願いします","translatedEnglishLine":"If possible, please remove those states promptly while handling her."},{"lineNumber":250988,"originalJapaneseLine":"誰かがいう、ランスの事を見て怯えているようだし","translatedEnglishLine":"Someone says she seems frightened when she looks at Rance."},{"lineNumber":250989,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスが捕まえようとしたら逃げるんじゃ無い？とか","translatedEnglishLine":"Like, if Rance tries to catch her, she might run away?"},{"lineNumber":250990,"originalJapaneseLine":"アニスが正気に戻った","translatedEnglishLine":"Anis regained her sanity."},{"lineNumber":250991,"originalJapaneseLine":"エッチした事を明かす、それでランスが怖かった","translatedEnglishLine":"She reveals they had sex, and that's why she was scared of Rance."},{"lineNumber":250992,"originalJapaneseLine":"千鶴子が怒ると勘違いしてアニスは逃げていく","translatedEnglishLine":"Thinking Chizuruko would get angry, Anis runs away."},{"lineNumber":250993,"originalJapaneseLine":"パパイア、軽く挨拶","translatedEnglishLine":"Papaya gives a brief greeting."},{"lineNumber":250994,"originalJapaneseLine":"ガルティアの説明、大食らい、兵糧攻めをしてくる、食か生か","translatedEnglishLine":"Explanation about Gaultia: a glutton who lays siege by cutting off supplies; it’s eat or be eaten."},{"lineNumber":250995,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔法ビジョン、メディウサによる陵辱","translatedEnglishLine":"Magical vision: the violation by Medusa."},{"lineNumber":250996,"originalJapaneseLine":"これによりゼス全土は恐怖に支配されている","translatedEnglishLine":"Because of this, the entire land of Zeth is ruled by fear."},{"lineNumber":250997,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞選択","translatedEnglishLine":"> Choice"},{"lineNumber":250998,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞　ガルティアを倒しに行く","translatedEnglishLine":"> Go defeat Gaultia"},{"lineNumber":250999,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞　メディウサを倒しに行く","translatedEnglishLine":"> Go defeat Medusa"},{"lineNumber":251000,"originalJapaneseLine":"よし、まずは魔人ガルティアを倒す","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, first let's defeat the demon Gaultia."},{"lineNumber":251001,"originalJapaneseLine":"ゼスの東南部方面に攻めてきています、いきましょう","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s attacking the southeastern area of Zeth; let’s go."},{"lineNumber":251002,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんだ、元きた道を戻る事になるな、まぁいい","translatedEnglishLine":"So, we’re going back the way we came. Well, that's fine."},{"lineNumber":251003,"originalJapaneseLine":"マジックが来る、ランス気をつけてとか・・何か言ってもいいかな。","translatedEnglishLine":"Magic is coming, maybe saying 'Rance, be careful' or something... Can I say something?"},{"lineNumber":251004,"originalJapaneseLine":"ついては来ません。ついていきたいけど立場は国王代理なので城にいないといけない","translatedEnglishLine":"She won't follow us. She wants to, but as the King's proxy, she has to stay at the castle."},{"lineNumber":251005,"originalJapaneseLine":"そういう分別は出来ている子","translatedEnglishLine":"She’s a child who understands that kind of responsibility."},{"lineNumber":251006,"originalJapaneseLine":"東側の自由都市に近いどこか・・小さな町","translatedEnglishLine":"Somewhere near the free cities on the east side... a small town."},{"lineNumber":251007,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達がガルティア退治に向かう途中で立ち寄る","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and the others stop by here on their way to hunt down Gaultia."},{"lineNumber":251008,"originalJapaneseLine":"町についた少し休憩しよう","translatedEnglishLine":"They arrived in town; let's take a short break."},{"lineNumber":251009,"originalJapaneseLine":"３０台ほどの荷馬車があった、コパ帝国のマークがついている","translatedEnglishLine":"There were about 30 horse-drawn carts bearing the mark of the Copa Empire."},{"lineNumber":251010,"originalJapaneseLine":"何か揉めている、これから南の前線の町に物資を届けに行くのだが、護衛が付かない","translatedEnglishLine":"They seem to be having a dispute. They’re going to deliver supplies to a southern frontline town, but no escort is assigned."},{"lineNumber":251011,"originalJapaneseLine":"コパ帝国から物資を運んできた者（コパの部下）とゼスの兵士でもめている","translatedEnglishLine":"The Copa Empire's supply transporters (Copa subordinates) are quarrelling with Zeth soldiers."},{"lineNumber":251012,"originalJapaneseLine":"そんな余裕ないんだ、どこも兵士は足りない","translatedEnglishLine":"We don’t have the luxury; there aren’t enough soldiers anywhere."},{"lineNumber":251013,"originalJapaneseLine":"前線の町へ行く途中は魔軍にまだ占領されていないが山賊があばれまくっているという","translatedEnglishLine":"On the way to the frontline town, though not yet occupied by demon armies, bandits are running wild."},{"lineNumber":251014,"originalJapaneseLine":"話じゃないか、すでに何隊もやらてれいる、それではいけない","translatedEnglishLine":"That’s just talk; several squads have already been wiped out. That can't be allowed."},{"lineNumber":251015,"originalJapaneseLine":"それは困る、言って物資を届けてもらわないと、前線の町は食料が無くて餓死してしまう","translatedEnglishLine":"That’s a problem. We need those supplies delivered, or the frontline town will starve to death."},{"lineNumber":251016,"originalJapaneseLine":"だからわざわざ物資を持ってきたんだ・・もめもめ","translatedEnglishLine":"That’s why we went out of our way to bring supplies... dispute, dispute."},{"lineNumber":251017,"originalJapaneseLine":"シィルあたりがちょうど私達もいく所ですし、護衛してあげましょうとランスを説得","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance convinces them that since they’re also going near Seel, they can provide an escort."},{"lineNumber":251018,"originalJapaneseLine":"一緒にいく事になった","translatedEnglishLine":"They decided to go together."},{"lineNumber":251019,"originalJapaneseLine":"サテラによるガルティアの設定説明","translatedEnglishLine":"Satella explains the background of Gaultia."},{"lineNumber":251020,"originalJapaneseLine":"大食いな奴うんぬん","translatedEnglishLine":"About the gluttonous guy and such."},{"lineNumber":251021,"originalJapaneseLine":"悪い奴ではない","translatedEnglishLine":"He’s not a bad guy."},{"lineNumber":251022,"originalJapaneseLine":"食料運搬を護衛中の会話","translatedEnglishLine":"Conversation during the escort of the food transport."},{"lineNumber":251023,"originalJapaneseLine":"話題として次の情報を出します","translatedEnglishLine":"They bring up the following topics."},{"lineNumber":251024,"originalJapaneseLine":"・ゼスの前線では魔人ガルティアに食料を奪われ、餓死寸前の都市が多い","translatedEnglishLine":"- On Zeth's frontlines, many cities are on the brink of starvation because the demon Gaultia steals their food."},{"lineNumber":251025,"originalJapaneseLine":"・各国連合、およびコパンドンが各地から食料を集めて送っているのでなんとか持っている","translatedEnglishLine":"- The allied nations and Copandon collect and send food from various places, so they are managing somehow."},{"lineNumber":251026,"originalJapaneseLine":"・ただ、なんど送ってもガルティアに取られるばかりで・・","translatedEnglishLine":"- However, no matter how many times they send supplies, Gaultia always takes them."},{"lineNumber":251027,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスはあまり興味なく、シィルがそうですか大変ですねとか代わりに対話","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance isn't very interested, so Seel responds instead, saying 'I see, that's tough'."},{"lineNumber":251028,"originalJapaneseLine":"山道、ここから先　道が細くなっている","translatedEnglishLine":"Mountain path: beyond here, the road narrows."},{"lineNumber":251029,"originalJapaneseLine":"このあたりで特に勢力をふるっている山賊団がいる危険地帯です","translatedEnglishLine":"This area is a dangerous zone with a particularly powerful bandit gang operating."},{"lineNumber":251030,"originalJapaneseLine":"どうか出会いませんようにと進む輸送隊","translatedEnglishLine":"The transport convoy proceeds, hoping not to encounter them."},{"lineNumber":251031,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クルックーいわくゾンビではなくちゃんと魂があり生きていると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: According to Kukkuu, they are not zombies; they properly have souls and are alive.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: きくは別部隊２万を率いて東側の戦線に参加しているぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kiku is leading a separate unit of 20,000 soldiers and participating on the eastern front line.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達が臨時首都テープに到着した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others have arrived at the provisional capital, Tape.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジック千鶴子、戦局説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Magic Chizuruko explains the war situation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガンジーは前線で単独で戦っている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gandhi is fighting alone on the front lines.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 臨時の司令部で千鶴子、マジックと会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the temporary command center, a conversation with Chizuruko and Magic.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アニスが戻って来たがランスを見て暴走する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Anis returned but goes berserk when she sees Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 千鶴子達が外に出てアニスを止めます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chizuruko and the others go outside to stop Anis.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘中のイベント・・３ラウンド目
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Event during battle… 3rd round.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人に乗り移られていた時よりやばいんじゃないか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Isn't this worse than when she was possessed by the demon?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あいつ、本当に人間か・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is that girl really human...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 混乱しているだけなので、すみません、もう少し耐えていただけたら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She is just confused, so sorry, please bear with her a little longer.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ、それから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, and also,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アニスは、燃え、凍え、感電なので異常状態に極度に興奮するので
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Anis gets extremely agitated by abnormal states like burning, freezing, or electrocution.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 出来ればすみやかに解除しながらお願いします
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If possible, please remove those states promptly while handling her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰かがいう、ランスの事を見て怯えているようだし
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone says she seems frightened when she looks at Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが捕まえようとしたら逃げるんじゃ無い？とか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Like, if Rance tries to catch her, she might run away?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アニスが正気に戻った
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Anis regained her sanity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エッチした事を明かす、それでランスが怖かった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She reveals they had sex, and that's why she was scared of Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 千鶴子が怒ると勘違いしてアニスは逃げていく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thinking Chizuruko would get angry, Anis runs away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パパイア、軽く挨拶
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Papaya gives a brief greeting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガルティアの説明、大食らい、兵糧攻めをしてくる、食か生か
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Explanation about Gaultia: a glutton who lays siege by cutting off supplies; it’s eat or be eaten.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔法ビジョン、メディウサによる陵辱
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Magical vision: the violation by Medusa.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これによりゼス全土は恐怖に支配されている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because of this, the entire land of Zeth is ruled by fear.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞選択
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Choice

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　ガルティアを倒しに行く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Go defeat Gaultia

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　メディウサを倒しに行く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Go defeat Medusa

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、まずは魔人ガルティアを倒す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, first let's defeat the demon Gaultia.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼスの東南部方面に攻めてきています、いきましょう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s attacking the southeastern area of Zeth; let’s go.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだ、元きた道を戻る事になるな、まぁいい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, we’re going back the way we came. Well, that's fine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックが来る、ランス気をつけてとか・・何か言ってもいいかな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Magic is coming, maybe saying 'Rance, be careful' or something... Can I say something?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ついては来ません。ついていきたいけど立場は国王代理なので城にいないといけない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She won't follow us. She wants to, but as the King's proxy, she has to stay at the castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そういう分別は出来ている子
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She’s a child who understands that kind of responsibility.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 東側の自由都市に近いどこか・・小さな町
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Somewhere near the free cities on the east side... a small town.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達がガルティア退治に向かう途中で立ち寄る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others stop by here on their way to hunt down Gaultia.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 町についた少し休憩しよう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They arrived in town; let's take a short break.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ３０台ほどの荷馬車があった、コパ帝国のマークがついている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There were about 30 horse-drawn carts bearing the mark of the Copa Empire.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何か揉めている、これから南の前線の町に物資を届けに行くのだが、護衛が付かない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They seem to be having a dispute. They’re going to deliver supplies to a southern frontline town, but no escort is assigned.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コパ帝国から物資を運んできた者（コパの部下）とゼスの兵士でもめている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Copa Empire's supply transporters (Copa subordinates) are quarrelling with Zeth soldiers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな余裕ないんだ、どこも兵士は足りない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We don’t have the luxury; there aren’t enough soldiers anywhere.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 前線の町へ行く途中は魔軍にまだ占領されていないが山賊があばれまくっているという
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On the way to the frontline town, though not yet occupied by demon armies, bandits are running wild.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 話じゃないか、すでに何隊もやらてれいる、それではいけない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That’s just talk; several squads have already been wiped out. That can't be allowed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは困る、言って物資を届けてもらわないと、前線の町は食料が無くて餓死してしまう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That’s a problem. We need those supplies delivered, or the frontline town will starve to death.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だからわざわざ物資を持ってきたんだ・・もめもめ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That’s why we went out of our way to bring supplies... dispute, dispute.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルあたりがちょうど私達もいく所ですし、護衛してあげましょうとランスを説得
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance convinces them that since they’re also going near Seel, they can provide an escort.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一緒にいく事になった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They decided to go together.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラによるガルティアの設定説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satella explains the background of Gaultia.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大食いな奴うんぬん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: About the gluttonous guy and such.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 悪い奴ではない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He’s not a bad guy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 食料運搬を護衛中の会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Conversation during the escort of the food transport.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 話題として次の情報を出します
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They bring up the following topics.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・ゼスの前線では魔人ガルティアに食料を奪われ、餓死寸前の都市が多い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - On Zeth's frontlines, many cities are on the brink of starvation because the demon Gaultia steals their food.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・各国連合、およびコパンドンが各地から食料を集めて送っているのでなんとか持っている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - The allied nations and Copandon collect and send food from various places, so they are managing somehow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・ただ、なんど送ってもガルティアに取られるばかりで・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - However, no matter how many times they send supplies, Gaultia always takes them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスはあまり興味なく、シィルがそうですか大変ですねとか代わりに対話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance isn't very interested, so Seel responds instead, saying 'I see, that's tough'.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 山道、ここから先　道が細くなっている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mountain path: beyond here, the road narrows.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このあたりで特に勢力をふるっている山賊団がいる危険地帯です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This area is a dangerous zone with a particularly powerful bandit gang operating.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうか出会いませんようにと進む輸送隊
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The transport convoy proceeds, hoping not to encounter them.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クルックーいわくゾンビではなくちゃんと魂があり生きていると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: According to Kukkuu, they are not zombies; they properly have souls and are alive.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: きくは別部隊２万を率いて東側の戦線に参加しているぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kiku is leading a separate unit of 20,000 soldiers and participating on the eastern front line.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達が臨時首都テープに到着した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others have arrived at the provisional capital, Tape.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジック千鶴子、戦局説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Magic Chizuruko explains the war situation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガンジーは前線で単独で戦っている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gandhi is fighting alone on the front lines.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 臨時の司令部で千鶴子、マジックと会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the temporary command center, a conversation with Chizuruko and Magic.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アニスが戻って来たがランスを見て暴走する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Anis returned but goes berserk when she sees Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 千鶴子達が外に出てアニスを止めます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chizuruko and the others go outside to stop Anis.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘中のイベント・・３ラウンド目
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Event during battle… 3rd round.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人に乗り移られていた時よりやばいんじゃないか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Isn't this worse than when she was possessed by the demon?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あいつ、本当に人間か・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is that girl really human...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 混乱しているだけなので、すみません、もう少し耐えていただけたら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She is just confused, so sorry, please bear with her a little longer.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ、それから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, and also,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アニスは、燃え、凍え、感電なので異常状態に極度に興奮するので
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Anis gets extremely agitated by abnormal states like burning, freezing, or electrocution.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 出来ればすみやかに解除しながらお願いします
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If possible, please remove those states promptly while handling her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰かがいう、ランスの事を見て怯えているようだし
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone says she seems frightened when she looks at Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが捕まえようとしたら逃げるんじゃ無い？とか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Like, if Rance tries to catch her, she might run away?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アニスが正気に戻った
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Anis regained her sanity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エッチした事を明かす、それでランスが怖かった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She reveals they had sex, and that's why she was scared of Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 千鶴子が怒ると勘違いしてアニスは逃げていく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thinking Chizuruko would get angry, Anis runs away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パパイア、軽く挨拶
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Papaya gives a brief greeting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガルティアの説明、大食らい、兵糧攻めをしてくる、食か生か
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Explanation about Gaultia: a glutton who lays siege by cutting off supplies; it’s eat or be eaten.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔法ビジョン、メディウサによる陵辱
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Magical vision: the violation by Medusa.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これによりゼス全土は恐怖に支配されている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because of this, the entire land of Zeth is ruled by fear.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞選択
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Choice

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　ガルティアを倒しに行く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Go defeat Gaultia

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　メディウサを倒しに行く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Go defeat Medusa

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、まずは魔人ガルティアを倒す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, first let's defeat the demon Gaultia.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼスの東南部方面に攻めてきています、いきましょう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s attacking the southeastern area of Zeth; let’s go.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだ、元きた道を戻る事になるな、まぁいい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, we’re going back the way we came. Well, that's fine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックが来る、ランス気をつけてとか・・何か言ってもいいかな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Magic is coming, maybe saying 'Rance, be careful' or something... Can I say something?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ついては来ません。ついていきたいけど立場は国王代理なので城にいないといけない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She won't follow us. She wants to, but as the King's proxy, she has to stay at the castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そういう分別は出来ている子
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She’s a child who understands that kind of responsibility.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 東側の自由都市に近いどこか・・小さな町
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Somewhere near the free cities on the east side... a small town.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達がガルティア退治に向かう途中で立ち寄る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others stop by here on their way to hunt down Gaultia.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 町についた少し休憩しよう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They arrived in town; let's take a short break.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ３０台ほどの荷馬車があった、コパ帝国のマークがついている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There were about 30 horse-drawn carts bearing the mark of the Copa Empire.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何か揉めている、これから南の前線の町に物資を届けに行くのだが、護衛が付かない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They seem to be having a dispute. They’re going to deliver supplies to a southern frontline town, but no escort is assigned.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コパ帝国から物資を運んできた者（コパの部下）とゼスの兵士でもめている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Copa Empire's supply transporters (Copa subordinates) are quarrelling with Zeth soldiers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな余裕ないんだ、どこも兵士は足りない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We don’t have the luxury; there aren’t enough soldiers anywhere.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 前線の町へ行く途中は魔軍にまだ占領されていないが山賊があばれまくっているという
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On the way to the frontline town, though not yet occupied by demon armies, bandits are running wild.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 話じゃないか、すでに何隊もやらてれいる、それではいけない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That’s just talk; several squads have already been wiped out. That can't be allowed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは困る、言って物資を届けてもらわないと、前線の町は食料が無くて餓死してしまう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That’s a problem. We need those supplies delivered, or the frontline town will starve to death.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だからわざわざ物資を持ってきたんだ・・もめもめ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That’s why we went out of our way to bring supplies... dispute, dispute.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルあたりがちょうど私達もいく所ですし、護衛してあげましょうとランスを説得
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance convinces them that since they’re also going near Seel, they can provide an escort.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一緒にいく事になった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They decided to go together.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラによるガルティアの設定説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satella explains the background of Gaultia.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大食いな奴うんぬん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: About the gluttonous guy and such.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 悪い奴ではない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He’s not a bad guy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 食料運搬を護衛中の会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Conversation during the escort of the food transport.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 話題として次の情報を出します
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They bring up the following topics.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・ゼスの前線では魔人ガルティアに食料を奪われ、餓死寸前の都市が多い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - On Zeth's frontlines, many cities are on the brink of starvation because the demon Gaultia steals their food.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・各国連合、およびコパンドンが各地から食料を集めて送っているのでなんとか持っている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - The allied nations and Copandon collect and send food from various places, so they are managing somehow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・ただ、なんど送ってもガルティアに取られるばかりで・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - However, no matter how many times they send supplies, Gaultia always takes them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスはあまり興味なく、シィルがそうですか大変ですねとか代わりに対話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance isn't very interested, so Seel responds instead, saying 'I see, that's tough'.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 山道、ここから先　道が細くなっている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mountain path: beyond here, the road narrows.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このあたりで特に勢力をふるっている山賊団がいる危険地帯です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This area is a dangerous zone with a particularly powerful bandit gang operating.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうか出会いませんようにと進む輸送隊
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The transport convoy proceeds, hoping not to encounter them.
